docs.snippet: The Saudi execution of a leading Shiite cleric, and its severing of ties with Iran, has raised doubts about U.S. ties to Riyadh....
docs.abstract: The Saudi execution of a leading Shiite cleric, and its severing of ties with Iran, has raised doubts about U.S. ties to Riyadh.

docs.snippet: The latest developments after Saudi Arabia severs diplomatic ties with Tehran amid a dispute over Riyadh's execution of an opposition Shiite cleric and attacks on Saudi diplomatic posts in Iran. (All times local.)...
docs.lead_paragraph: The latest developments after Saudi Arabia severs diplomatic ties with Tehran amid a dispute over Riyadh's execution of an opposition Shiite cleric and attacks on Saudi diplomatic posts in Iran. (All times local.)

headline.main: The Latest: UN Condemns Attacks on Saudi Missions in Iran
headline.print_headline: The Latest: UN Condemns Attacks on Saudi Missions in Iran
